name: sportsguide
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sports guide
des:
this is like a sports guide to you of games( for the time being ) namely cricket, basketball, football , hockey.
first you choose your game .. then you select if you want the rules of that game or not then you enter your location(namely delhi , mumbai , bangalore, kolkata) . then you select if u want coaching academy or equipment store near your selected location ..
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
